title: "“All_Aboard” app effectively aids blind and visually impaired commuters in finding bus stops"
excerpt: "An app called All_Aboard, designed to help people who are blind and visually imparied find their bus stops, was found in a new study to have a high success rate helping those indviduals find their bus stops."
